# Government Tender Announcement

## Request for Proposal (RFP)
### National Capital Region (NCR)

#### RFP Number: S4376078
The Department of National Defense issues a Request for Proposal (RFP) for Temporary Help Services under the Supply Arrangement (SA) EN578-172870. The RFP seeks qualified suppliers to provide special advisor services to the Department of National Defense.

#### RFP Description

The Department of National Defense has a requirement for Temporary Help Services and has issued a Request for Proposal to suppliers generated from the CPSS who are qualified under the streams and categories listed above (13.9 Special Advisor).

### Areas of Opportunity

This RFP is open only to those SA holders who have qualified under the following streams and categories:

13.9 Special Advisor

The following SA Holders have been invited to submit a proposal:

1.	1019837 Ontario Inc.
2.	8513929 Canada Inc.
3.	Akkada professional Services and Zernam Enterprise in JV
4.	Altis Human Resources (Ottawa) Inc.
5.	AZUR HUMAN RESOURCES LIMITED
6.	Barbara Personnel Inc.
7.	Coradix technology Consulting Ltd.
8.	Elevated Thinking Inc.
9.	Gartner Canada Co.
10.	HubSpoke Inc.
11.	Lionel Drouin
12.	Malarsoft Technology Corporation
13.	Maplesoft Administrative Services Inc.
14.	Olav Consulting Corp
15.	Veritaaq Technology House Inc.

### Bid Submission and Evaluation

Bidders must submit their proposals electronically. The proposals will be evaluated based on the lowest price criterion.

### Security Clearance

A minimum security clearance of Secret is required for this bid.

### Attachment

The RFP document is available on the Canada Buys website. Interested parties must register and log in to access the documents.
